title: Desktop notifications
body: Hello! Is there any option that allows a user to link the league forums and news page to the desktop notifications in Windows 10?

replies.body:
Not that I know of! I assume you mean a link that will stay persistent in your Notification Pane that you can access at will? If so, it's not something I'm aware of, but you may be able to find an app that can save specific URLs in the notification area.

Let me know if this helped!
